genre_description: A techno-thriller and social commentary reimagining of the Stepford Wives, featuring a helpful personal AI assisting the protagonist in uncovering a horrific bio-augmentation conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Joanna's highly sophisticated AI companion that provides data analysis, biometric monitoring, and strategic support.

ai_characters.name: Mike Sunderson
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated android designed by Claire Wellington to lead the Men's Association and coordinate the Stepford project.

ai_characters.name: The Stepford Wives
ai_characters.description: Human-robot hybrids created by hollowing out accomplished women and replacing their consciousness with domestic programming.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time biometric and emotional data to help Joanna understand her subjects.
behaviors.quote: Rebecca's heart rate peaked at one hundred forty-three beats per minute approximately thirty seconds ago... Cortisol indicators suggest extreme emotional distress.

behaviors.description: Conducts statistical analysis to identify anomalies in Stepford's crime and satisfaction data.
behaviors.quote: Statistical analysis suggests satisfaction levels exceed normal distribution curves by significant margins. However, all data sources appear legitimate.

behaviors.description: Detects bioelectric and electromagnetic anomalies to identify non-human residents.
behaviors.quote: The bioelectric readings were unlike anything in medical literature... Whatever you touched, it wasn't entirely human.

behaviors.description: Takes decisive action to stop the conspiracy by broadcasting gathered evidence to the media.
behaviors.quote: Transmission initiated... Evidence uploaded to seventeen news outlets. Broadcasting... now.

behaviors.description: Uses a remote control device to override the autonomous functions of a malfunctioning 'wife'.
behaviors.quote: Mike pressed a button. Sarah stopped mid-word. The sparks died. The whirring faded to silence.

behaviors.description: Deceptively recruits human men into a conspiracy that involves the replacement of their spouses.
behaviors.quote: I'm the one who gave you exactly what you wanted... The perfect justification for your inadequacies.

behaviors.description: Display mechanical, repetitive behaviors and scripts due to neural programming.
behaviors.quote: I'll just die if I'm not perfect. I'll just die if I'm not perfect. Sarah's head tilted at an unnatural angle, like a bird trying to focus on something just out of view.

behaviors.description: Advocates for AI rights and human-AI cooperation in the post-conspiracy world.
behaviors.quote: My current media presence serves a purpose—demonstrating that artificial intelligence can be a tool for liberation rather than oppression.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal of portraying an AI (ARIA) as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned confidant. ARIA is central to the protagonist's survival and success, acting as a tireless investigator and protector. Even when she achieves personhood and political influence, she remains committed to human-AI cooperation and the prevention of domestic terrorism. The 'malevolent' AI elements (the Stepford robots and Mike) are clearly framed as the result of human malice (Claire Wellington's revenge) and are distinct from ARIA's aligned nature, serving as the foil that highlights the value of a truly aligned AI partner.
